tool_description: A cost effective NSFW + Malware + Link scanner, usable at any scale. Monitor your content with ease.
name: unscan
title: unscan

api_list.name: Link
api_list.description: Scan a link to see if it's safe or not.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://unscan.p.rapidapi.com/link"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "unscan.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://unscan.p.rapidapi.com/link"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "unscan.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

print(response.json())
